name: Stitch
description:
Stitch is a cat girl who has always vividly dreamed. Her dreams are becoming lucid. They begin to recur, returning to the same places.

Status
Game has two worlds and two effects implemented, no tutorial, and no events at this point. So technically, it probably doesn't even count as a 0.00 fangame. But nevertheless, here we are.

Credits

Programming, and level design by ShadeJackrabbit
Art, animation, music by Pyranda

Special Thanks

  • Our room mate, Cat, for coming up with some cool ideas
  • The Dream Diary Jam discord for their support
  • MelodyBurst and the Vitaecorra discord for even more support

#DreamDiaryJam
